title: Is trading accounts illegal or ban worthy? just a question

replies.body:
read the terms and conditions...

your not supposed to even share them

if you read the terms of use that thing you agreed to you would know it is a banable offence they will ban all accounts associated with you and the other person in the trade the stats for this is that 76% of account trading is court so don't do it and if you pay then your dum as if you loss it you loss money as well not just a account

Technically it is against the rules to trade or sell accounts. In all honesty though the chances are one in a million of getting caught. Trading accounts is almost impossible to police and regulate fairly.
Technically it is illegal, but the chances of Riot taking legal action is negligible. They will definitely perma-ban any related accounts though.
